thread.section_title: Courtyard New York Downtown Manhattan / World Trade Center Area - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean & Convenient
thread.title_full: Clean & Convenient - Review of Courtyard New York Downtown Manhattan / World Trade Center Area, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CanadianD30
title: Clean & Convenient
text:
Stayed for 3 nights at this hotel.
This hotel was very new. The staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean but small.
The location is good! Right next to the 9/11 memorial and close to a subway station (On Rector St), also a short walk to Wall Street.
The Subway is the best way to get around Manhattan! You can easily see most of the sights simply by riding the subway. You'll need to buy a MTS pass, which can be purchased at most subway entrances.
I would definitely stay here again if the price was right!
